analysis.description:
BurnupGameFinance._assignBuyoutProceeds (/unique_chucks/4/0x1f58af89d12d4a60647f99a9fc71dd0367b56df4.sol#754-798) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- burnupHolding.payBeneficiaries.value(fee)() (/unique_chucks/4/0x1f58af89d12d4a60647f99a9fc71dd0367b56df4.sol#793)

BurnupGameFinance._sendFunds (/unique_chucks/4/0x1f58af89d12d4a60647f99a9fc71dd0367b56df4.sol#856-865) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- ! beneficiary.send(amount) (/unique_chucks/4/0x1f58af89d12d4a60647f99a9fc71dd0367b56df4.sol#858-864)

Reentrancy in BurnupGameFinance._assignBuyoutProceeds (/unique_chucks/4/0x1f58af89d12d4a60647f99a9fc71dd0367b56df4.sol#754-798):
	External calls:
	- referrer1 = burnupHolding.referrerOf(msg.sender) (/unique_chucks/4/0x1f58af89d12d4a60647f99a9fc71dd0367b56df4.sol#779)
	External calls sending eth:
	- _sendFunds(currentOwner,currentOwnerWinnings) (/unique_chucks/4/0x1f58af89d12d4a60647f99a9fc71dd0367b56df4.sol#763-764)
	- _sendFunds(referrer1,referralBonus) (/unique_chucks/4/0x1f58af89d12d4a60647f99a9fc71dd0367b56df4.sol#782)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- payments (/unique_chucks/4/0x1f58af89d12d4a60647f99a9fc71dd0367b56df4.sol#782)
	- totalPayments (/unique_chucks/4/0x1f58af89d12d4a60647f99a9fc71dd0367b56df4.sol#782)

Reentrancy in BurnupGameFinance._assignBuyoutProceeds (/unique_chucks/4/0x1f58af89d12d4a60647f99a9fc71dd0367b56df4.sol#754-798):
	External calls:

	- referrer2 = burnupHolding.referrerOf(referrer1) (/unique_chucks/4/0x1f58af89d12d4a60647f99a9fc71dd0367b56df4.sol#783)
	External calls sending eth:
	- _sendFunds(currentOwner,currentOwnerWinnings) (/unique_chucks/4/0x1f58af89d12d4a60647f99a9fc71dd0367b56df4.sol#763-764)
	- _sendFunds(referrer1,referralBonus) (/unique_chucks/4/0x1f58af89d12d4a60647f99a9fc71dd0367b56df4.sol#782)
	- _sendFunds(referrer2,referralBonus) (/unique_chucks/4/0x1f58af89d12d4a60647f99a9fc71dd0367b56df4.sol#784-785)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- payments (/unique_chucks/4/0x1f58af89d12d4a60647f99a9fc71dd0367b56df4.sol#784-785)
	- totalPayments (/unique_chucks/4/0x1f58af89d12d4a60647f99a9fc71dd0367b56df4.sol#784-785)

Reentrancy in BurnupGameCore.buyout (/unique_chucks/4/0x1f58af89d12d4a60647f99a9fc71dd0367b56df4.sol#879-960):
	External calls:
	- price = _calculateAndAssignBuyoutProceeds(currentOwner,identifier,claimedSurroundingTiles) (/unique_chucks/4/0x1f58af89d12d4a60647f99a9fc71dd0367b56df4.sol#929-932)
	External calls sending eth:
	- _processGameEnd() (/unique_chucks/4/0x1f58af89d12d4a60647f99a9fc71dd0367b56df4.sol#881)
	- price = _calculateAndAssignBuyoutProceeds(currentOwner,identifier,claimedSurroundingTiles) (/unique_chucks/4/0x1f58af89d12d4a60647f99a9fc71dd0367b56df4.sol#929-932)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- gameStates (/unique_chucks/4/0x1f58af89d12d4a60647f99a9fc71dd0367b56df4.sol#935-937)

BurnupGameOwnership (/unique_chucks/4/0x1f58af89d12d4a60647f99a9fc71dd0367b56df4.sol#441-507) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/4/0x1f58af89d12d4a60647f99a9fc71dd0367b56df4.sol#495-507)
totalDividendPerBeneficiary in BurnupGameFinance._calculateAndAssignBuyoutProceeds (/unique_chucks/4/0x1f58af89d12d4a60647f99a9fc71dd0367b56df4.sol#827-829) is a local variable never initialiazed

BurnupGameCore.buyoutAndSetReferrer (/unique_chucks/4/0x1f58af89d12d4a60647f99a9fc71dd0367b56df4.sol#972-980) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-burnupHolding.setReferrer(msg.sender,referrerAddress) (/unique_chucks/4/0x1f58af89d12d4a60647f99a9fc71dd0367b56df4.sol#976)

Reentrancy in BurnupGameFinance._assignBuyoutProceeds (/unique_chucks/4/0x1f58af89d12d4a60647f99a9fc71dd0367b56df4.sol#754-798):
	External calls:
	- referrer1 = burnupHolding.referrerOf(msg.sender) (/unique_chucks/4/0x1f58af89d12d4a60647f99a9fc71dd0367b56df4.sol#779)
	- referrer2 = burnupHolding.referrerOf(referrer1) (/unique_chucks/4/0x1f58af89d12d4a60647f99a9fc71dd0367b56df4.sol#783)
	- burnupHolding.payBeneficiaries.value(fee)() (/unique_chucks/4/0x1f58af89d12d4a60647f99a9fc71dd0367b56df4.sol#793)
	External calls sending eth:
	- _sendFunds(currentOwner,currentOwnerWinnings) (/unique_chucks/4/0x1f58af89d12d4a60647f99a9fc71dd0367b56df4.sol#763-764)
	- _sendFunds(referrer1,referralBonus) (/unique_chucks/4/0x1f58af89d12d4a60647f99a9fc71dd0367b56df4.sol#782)
	- _sendFunds(referrer2,referralBonus) (/unique_chucks/4/0x1f58af89d12d4a60647f99a9fc71dd0367b56df4.sol#784-785)
	- burnupHolding.payBeneficiaries.value(fee)() (/unique_chucks/4/0x1f58af89d12d4a60647f99a9fc71dd0367b56df4.sol#793)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- gameStates (/unique_chucks/4/0x1f58af89d12d4a60647f99a9fc71dd0367b56df4.sol#795-798)

BurnupGameCore.buyout (/unique_chucks/4/0x1f58af89d12d4a60647f99a9fc71dd0367b56df4.sol#879-960) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(gameStates[gameIndex].gameStartTimestamp.add(gameSettings[gameIndex].activityTimer) >= block.timestamp) (/unique_chucks/4/0x1f58af89d12d4a60647f99a9fc71dd0367b56df4.sol#919-922)
	- require(bool)(gameStates[gameIndex].identifierToBuyoutTimestamp[identifier].add(gameSettings[gameIndex].activityTimer) >= block.timestamp) (/unique_chucks/4/0x1f58af89d12d4a60647f99a9fc71dd0367b56df4.sol#923-926)

BurnupGameCore._processGameEnd (/unique_chucks/4/0x1f58af89d12d4a60647f99a9fc71dd0367b56df4.sol#1009-1021) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- gameStates[gameIndex].identifierToBuyoutTimestamp[gameStates[gameIndex].lastFlippedTile].add(gameSettings[gameIndex].activityTimer) >= block.timestamp (/unique_chucks/4/0x1f58af89d12d4a60647f99a9fc71dd0367b56df4.sol#1018-1021)
